An estimated 3.5 million had their access to clean tap water disrupted or entirely cut off during the 90-minute contest, with federal officials tracking over 600 public water systems that partially or fully failed […]

At a national convention on climate change adaptation, an Ontario government minister   didn’t once mention climate change. Trevor Jones, Ontario’s associate minister of emergency preparedness, addressed a crowd at the Canadian Emergency Preparedness and Climate Adaptation (CEPCA) Convention, held in Ottawa last week. Jones focused primarily on government spending related to providing emergency equipment […]
